__e: Her aunt, her mother's sister... she lives near Fort Wayne.
In the event he didn't, I made a few calls around Fort Wayne claiming to be a genealogist working on a family tree.
I do know he called and asked for his old job back in Fort Wayne.
Forgot what it was like coming up to Fort Knox, getting up here to see you. Well, if you promise to come by more often,
I need proof... and the only way to prove
There's no way in. This place is like Fort Kknox.
